comment: Excellent professor/obnoxious attendance policy. Class is very relavent and she really knows her stuff.
Dr. Scarborough is one of the BEST professors in the education program. Any chance you get, TAKE HER!!! She's amazing!

By far my favorite professor at KSU.  Projects were easy enough, but very helpful.  Learned so much in this class. SHe is hilarious, approachable, and helpful.  I would recommend her to anyone and hope to have her for TOSS.    Absolutely the best.

Dr. Scarborough is the best education teacher at KSU. She absolutely knows what she's talking about, her assignments are worthwhile, and she is so understanding if you have issues. She's so easy to talk to and always has fun activities to do. I'd take her for every class if I could! Love her!
Everything you do in this class has a purpose and helps you. She is understanding with dealines and a GREAT teacher. Also, hilarious!
Great professor. She wants her students to succeed. She is available via email, text, and phone. This class was alot of fun.

Very nice and easy to talk to. We had quite a few projects but they will all help us later in our major. Everything we did was worth the time. Go to class, even if you don't know it - she takes attendance. I loved this Professor and I will be taking her again!

Wonderful professor! Kind and approachable, she doesnt give many big assignments and they arent difficult. She does alot of classroom group work and discussion. The lessons and outside reading assignment didnt take very long and she is fair/slightly lax on her grading. I would absolutely take her again if I could. One of my favorites at KSU.

Very friendly and personable teacher. Knows a lot and is helpful but not always clear. Attendance is mandatory, do not be late either, she keeps track even if you don't notice. Didn't use the book at all. She posts a lot of readings online. Flexible with due dates if she knows you are trying. Take her if you can, she's a great resource. Don't skip!
